links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
formula: a(n) ~ (-1)^(n+1) * sinh(1) * 2^(2*n+2) * n^(2*n-1) / (exp(2*n) * (cosh(Pi*tanh(1)+1) + cosh(Pi*tanh(1)-1) + 2*cosh(1))). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 30 2013
maple: a:= n-> (2*n)! *coeff(series(tanh(arcsinh(x)*tan(x)), x, 2*n+2), x, 2*n):seq (a(n), n=1..20);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 11 2012
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Definition clarified by and more terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 11 2012
